overview: Prior to joining borro, Anat was the VP of Product at iMedix where she led the product to win awards, including TechCrunch’s â€˜Crunchies’ Best New Start-up of 2007 Award. Anat brings to the table over 10 years of experience in web development and product management with expertise in ecommerce (retail, travel, insurance), search, and web 2.0. She holds a B.A. in Computer Science and an MBA from London Business School.
